title: Higginbotham adds Function Health preventive screening to benefits lineup
summary: Higginbotham, an employee-owned insurance and financial services firm headquartered in Fort Worth, Texas, announced the addition of Function Health, a comprehensive preventive screening platform, to its suite of workplace wellness and population health solutions, the company said. This expansion gives Higginbotham clients an additional tool to build preventive care into employee benefits strategies and aim [â€¦] The post Higginbotham adds Function Health preventive screening to benefits lineup appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
